name: Ayeeee
description:
Stranded and lost on an Island, Captain John has to survive through waves of enemies. Make him kill them all and maybe John will be able to find some secrets owned by others pirates, over the beach.

How to play :

Use you mouse to target and shoot ennemies. WASDto move your character.

Enjoy your experience ! ARGGGHHH.

Game created in 1 day for the Global Game Jam 2021
